hero.title: Find the Perfect Freelancer
hero.subtitle: Connect with skilled professionals for your projects
hero.description: Freelancers with commitment. Locally and directly deployable.

instant.title: Direct Booking
instant.description: Find and book local freelancers instantly for your urgent needs

scheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
scheduling.description: Schedule work that fits your timeline with easy booking management.

secure.title: Secure Platform
secure.description: Safe and secure payments with verified professionals

whyEinsatz.title: Why Choose Einsatz?
whyEinsatz.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and freelancers who trust Einsatz for their local service needs

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our platform today and experience the future of freelance services

mainHero.title: Let's change
mainHero.description: Connect with skilled professionals and build amazing projects together. We're making freelance work accessible to everyone.

freelancers.title: Our Freelancers
freelancers.subtitle: Amazing people behind
freelancers.description: Our talented freelancers have years of combined experience across various industries and skills.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Einsatz
whyChoose.subtitle: Our values reflect experience
whyChoose.description: We provide a comprehensive freelance platform that prioritizes security, transparency, and seamless booking experiences for both freelancers and clients.

directBooking.title: Direct Booking
directBooking.description: Skip the middleman and connect directly with skilled freelancers. Our streamlined booking process ensures quick, efficient project initiation.

dbaSecurity.title: Security within the DBA Act
dbaSecurity.description: Full compliance with the Dutch Business Act (DBA) ensures legal protection and secure transactions for all parties involved in freelance work.
dbaSecurity.ariaLabel: Learn more about DBA Act Security

securePlatform.title: Secure Platform
securePlatform.description: Advanced security measures protect your data and transactions. Our platform ensures safe, reliable connections between freelancers and clients.

footer.description: Connecting skilled professionals with businesses. Building the future of freelance work.

bookingProcess.step3DBA: Complete DBA assessment or skip (based on freelancer's status)

completeness.title: Profile Completeness
completeness.complete: Your profile is complete! Great job!

hints.lastName: Your last name as it appears on official documents

hints.bio: Your bio is your chance to make a great first impression. Tell potential clients about your experience, skills, and what makes you unique.
hints.bioTips: Tips for writing a great bio:
hints.bioTip1: Start with a brief introduction of who you are
hints.bioTip2: Highlight your key skills and experience
hints.bioTip3: Mention any certifications or special qualifications

jobOfferings.title: Job Offerings
jobOfferings.description: Manage your services and expertise in the dedicated job offerings page.
jobOfferings.cardDescription: Add and manage the services you offer to clients
jobOfferings.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your experience and services for this job category
jobOfferings.cardNoOfferings: You haven't added any job offerings yet.
jobOfferings.cardAddOfferings: Add job categories below to start receiving bookings.
jobOfferings.cardMaxOfferingsDescription: You have reached the maximum of {{maxOfferings}} job offerings{{wildcardEnabled}}. To add a new offering, please remove an existing one first.
jobOfferings.cannotChangeCategory: Category and subcategory cannot be changed when editing
jobOfferings.packagePricingDescription: After creating this job offering, you'll be able to add multiple service packages with different prices and features.
jobOfferings.textWillBeTruncated: Text will be truncated at 2 lines on the freelancers list
jobOfferings.jobOfferingCreated: Job offering created! You can now set up packages for {categoryName}{subcategoryName}
jobOfferings.duplicateOfferingExists: A job offering with this category and subcategory already exists. Please choose a different combination.
jobOfferings.invalidCategorySubcategory: Invalid category or subcategory selected. Please try again.
jobOfferings.duplicateOfferingLocal: A job offering with this category and subcategory already exists locally.
jobOfferings.addJobOfferingDescription: Add a new job offering to your profile. You can offer services in different categories and subcategories.
jobOfferings.defaultPackageDescription: A basic service package for this category. You can customize the name, description, and pricing.
jobOfferings.defaultPackageCreationFailed: Job offering created but failed to create default package. You can add packages manually.
jobOfferings.wildcardDescription: Enable an additional job offering beyond the standard limit. This allows you to offer flexible services that don't fit into specific categories.
jobOfferings.wildcardCannotDisable: Cannot disable wildcard while you have more than 3 job offerings
jobOfferings.wildcardHidden: Your wildcard offering is hidden when wildcard is disabled. Enable wildcard to manage it.
jobOfferings.addWildcardJobOfferingDescription: Add a special wildcard job offering that can be used for flexible or custom services
jobOfferings.wildcardDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your wildcard services and what makes them special...
jobOfferings.wildcardPackagePricingDescription: Create flexible packages for your wildcard services. These can be customized for different client needs.
jobOfferings.wildcardAlreadyExists: You already have a wildcard job offering. Only one wildcard offering is allowed.
jobOfferings.defaultWildcardPackageDescription: A flexible wildcard service package for this category. Customize as needed for different client requirements.
jobOfferings.wildcardWorkTypesDescription: Select the types of work you're willing to do. This helps clients find you even if they don't know your specific skills.
jobOfferings.wildcardWorkTypesRequired: Please select at least one work type
jobOfferings.wildcardJobOfferingCreated: Wildcard job offering created successfully with work types: {workTypes}
jobOfferings.wildcardOfferingsDescription: Flexible services that can adapt to various client needs
jobOfferings.pleaseWait: Please wait while we redirect you...

packageItems.fixedQuantityDescription: This quantity will be fixed for all clients

packageItems.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

dbaQuestionnaire.title: DBA Assessment
dbaQuestionnaire.subtitle: Complete your Dutch labor law compliance assessment for this service category.
dbaQuestionnaire.description: This helps protect both you and your clients by clarifying your working relationship.
dbaQuestionnaire.alertDescription: Your answers help determine your legal classification as an independent contractor. This assessment is optional but recommended for legal clarity.

dbaQuestionnaire.assessmentCompleteMessage: Your DBA assessment for {jobCategoryName} is now complete.
dbaQuestionnaire.failedToSaveAnswers: Failed to save answers. Please try again.
dbaQuestionnaire.workRelationshipDescription: Questions about your relationship with clients and work arrangements
dbaQuestionnaire.financialRiskDescription: Questions about financial independence and risk management
dbaQuestionnaire.workEnvironmentDescription: Questions about your work environment and business operations
dbaQuestionnaire.professionalRiskDescription: Questions about professional insurance and risk awareness

validation.completeOrSkipDBA: Please either complete the DBA assessment or skip it to proceed with the booking.
validation.freelancerDbaNotCompleted: The freelancer hasn't completed their DBA for this job category. Please skip DBA to proceed with the booking.

dba.freelancerCompletedDescription: The freelancer has completed their DBA assessment for this job category. You can either complete your own DBA assessment or skip it (you will bear legal risks).
dba.freelancerDbaNotCompletedDescription: The freelancer hasn't completed their DBA assessment for this job category. You will bear all legal responsibility if you proceed without DBA.
dba.proceedWithoutDBA: Proceed without DBA (You bear legal risks)
dba.acceptTermsFirstDescription: Please accept the terms and conditions above before proceeding with the DBA assessment.

buttons.completeDBAOrSkip: Complete DBA or Skip to Proceed

payments.title: Payments
payments.paymentsWillAppear: Payments will appear here when clients pay you
payments.completePaymentToConfirmBooking: Complete your payment to confirm the booking
payments.paymentHeldSecurelyUntilJobIsComplete: Payment is held securely until you confirm the job is complete.
payments.makePaymentAsAgreedAndAskFreelancerToMar: Make the payment as agreed and ask the freelancer to mark the booking as paid on the platform.
payments.discussAndAgreeOnPaymentMethod: Discuss and agree on a payment method that works for both of you (cash, bank transfer, etc.).
payments.useOurMessagingSystemToCoordinatePayment: Use our messaging system to coordinate payment details with the freelancer.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription: Please follow the instructions below to make the payment.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription2: If you have any questions, please contact the freelancer directly.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription3: If you have any issues, please contact our support team.
payments.offlinePaymentInstructionsDescription: Please follow the instructions below to make the payment.
payments.offlinePaymentInstructionsMessage: Message the freelancer to coordinate the payment.
payments.platformDoesNotStorePaymentInformation: Platform does not store payment information. All payments are processed through the platform's secure payment gateway.
payments.platformDoesNotHandleOfflinePayments: Platform does not handle offline payments. All payments are processed through the platform's secure payment gateway.
payments.alwayskeeprecordsOfPayments: Always keep records of payment. This will help you in case of any disputes.
payments.freelancerneedstoconfirmpayment: The freelancer needs to confirm the payment before it is released.
payments.disputecontactsupport: Dispute contact support if you have any issues.
payments.failedToLoadPaymentsData: Failed to load payments data. Please try again.
payments.yourInvoicesWillAppearHereOnceYouMakeBoo: Your invoices will appear here once you make bookings.
payments.yourInvoicesWillAppearHereOnceYouComplet: Your invoices will appear here once you complete jobs.
payments.yourTransactionHistoryWillAppearHereOnce: Your transaction history will appear here once you have completed payments.

id.offlinePaymentManagementDescription: This booking uses offline payment. Once you've received payment from the client, please mark it as paid.
id.yourReviewHelpsOthersMakeInformedDecisio: Your review helps others make informed decisions.
id.needHelpDescription: If you have any questions or need assistance with this booking, our support team is here to help.
id.thankYouForSharingYourFeedback: Thank you for sharing your feedback
id.yourReviewWillBePublishedAfterApproval: Your review will be published after approval.
id.connectionError: Connection error. Please try again in a moment.
id.packageDetailsWillBeAvailable: Package details will be available after booking confirmation.

dbaModal.warningFreelancerNoDBA: Warning: Freelancer has not completed DBA for this job category

dbaModal.freelancerNotCompletedDBA: The freelancer may not have completed their DBA assessment yet.
dbaModal.selectAnswersToDiscuss: Select the answers you'd like to discuss with the freelancer:
